name: SCIIAMBLE
description:
This is a 2K ($0801-$1000) memory game written over stream 2021 for the Cassette 50 Games Charity competition.

The game is simple, just fly thru the cavern bombing rockets, ships and fuel dumps, try and avoid the rockets launched at you :)

Be Prepared, this is a typical Cassette 50 game.... and so is almost impossible to play LOL

The goal is to score as high as possible for the fuel you have.

Joystick controls:
Up = Up, Down = Down, Right = Forward, Left = Bomb and fire = fire (of course lol)

Credits:

Programming, graphics and sound by John Dale

(C)2021 OldSkoolCoder

There is no download available. This is because this game is part of a competition submission which was made exclusively for the C64 Cassette 50 Charity Competition: https://itch.io/jam/the-c64-cassette-50-charity-competition
